name: Userstyles.org - Redesign(2011) Professional
description:
Features list:
- Fixed width (No more 100% width paragraphs)
- Icons for external links, style links, user profile links, menu links and etc.
- Clear & Simple, for advanced users and beginners. (Not the code, the design!)
- Even / Odd row background-color for rows and search results

If you like this style, please support it by commenting, rating or sharing it.

(NO MORE SUPPORTED.)
additional_info:
Change Log:
- (08/04/2011 - 14:39) Increased visited links color. (Thanks: user 15980)
- (08/04/2011 - 16:13) Added support for "Userstyles.org Enhancer"
- (08/04/2011 - 16:56) Changed menu view of "My Account" page
- (08/04/2011 - 20:31) Fixed next page button hover background-color & removed unnecessary comments
- (08/04/2011 - 22:38) Increased rating/dl colors & decreased font sizes. (Thanks: user 15980)
- (09/04/2011 - 00:43) Added Odd/Even row colors for "Userstyles.org Enhancer"
- (09/04/2011 - 01:32) Changed obsolete styles appearance for "Userstyles.org Enhancer2"
- (09/04/2011 - 01:32) Increased line-height of related styles
- (09/04/2011 - 01:32) Fixed bad rating image for discussions list
- (28/05/2011 - 19:14) Temporary & Fast Fixes for the new style-details page (Fixed Screenshotscontainer, Description etc.)
- (04/06/2011 - 13:49) Narrowed frontpage boxes width and menu list items width (Thanks: user 11343)
- (17/10/2011 - 18:42) Fixed many things due new site changes.
- (04/11/2011 - 15:10) Improved look
